name: Verify the 'Upgrade' is displayed against all locked integrations on the Integrations page.

elements.name: for PLG user verify 'Upgrade' is only displayed on locked integrations

steps.name: I read the file with the "profiles" and "plgUser"
I open up the core page
I enter the username in the username field on the login page
I enter the password in the password field on the login page
I click on the submit button of second button
I close the popup of the advertise in our application
